name: Instagram Comment Extractor
special_instructions: One or more Instagram post URLs must be provided, if it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
The maximum number of comments that can be scraped from each post is 50
The results may differ from what you see when logged in to your Instagram account
The tool only extracts comments shown to Instagram users who are not logged in
The tool can be integrated with various cloud services and web apps, and it can be used with the Apify API for programmatic access
The tool provides the following output fields: id, postId, text, position, timestamp, ownerId, ownerIsVerified, ownerUsername, ownerProfilePicUrl, postUrl, likesCount
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
